name: AboutListTile
desc: A [ListTile] that shows an about box.

fields.name: icon
fields.desc: The icon to show for this drawer item.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The label to show on this drawer item.

fields.name: applicationVersion
fields.desc: The version of this build of the application.

fields.name: applicationIcon
fields.desc: The icon to show next to the application name in the [AboutDialog].

fields.name: applicationLegalese
fields.desc: A string to show in small print in the [AboutDialog].

fields.name: aboutBoxChildren
fields.desc: Widgets to add to the [AboutDialog] after the name, version, and legalese.

fields.name: dense
fields.desc: Whether this list tile is part of a vertically dense list.
